# ByteArrayExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for objects Array of type Byte.

```csharp
public static class ByteArrayExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [SaveToFile](ByteArrayExtensions/SaveToFile.md)(…) | Saves this byte array into file. |
| static [SaveToFileAsync](ByteArrayExtensions/SaveToFileAsync.md)(…) | Saves this byte array into file asynchronously. |
